channel.title: Libre Baskerville on Hugo中文文档
channel.description: Recent content in Libre Baskerville on Hugo中文文档

item.description: Red Lounge This is an open-source Hugo theme designed by @shift8creative to be responsive and clean. It uses Pure.css and contains a few web fonts from Google as well as Font Awesome icons. So despite it being simple, it has a lot of flexibility in terms of typography and design elements. It’s also quite configurable as it has a few variables to change the appearance and features of the pages.
